item.description:

The first official release of STOW - your powerful video downloader for macOS!

Features

  • Download videos from YouTube, Vimeo, Instagram, TikTok, Twitter/X, and 1000+ sites
  • Multiple quality options including 4K, 1080p, 720p, and audio-only
  • Format selection: MP4, MOV, MKV, WebM, MP3, M4A, and more
  • Playlist support - download entire playlists at once
  • Clipboard detection - automatically detects video URLs
  • Drag and drop support
  • Pause, resume, and cancel downloads
  • Organize downloads with custom folders
  • Export as .stow bundles
  • Built-in troubleshooter
  • Automatic updates via Sparkle
